<row gap="medium">

---

This gritty powder improves responsiveness but suppresses thoughts and leaves you weakened. The saving throw for addiction to scour is DC 30, and the addiction is [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162).

**Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 hour; **Maximum Duration** 6 hours; **Stage 1** [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) and +2 item bonus to Reflex saves and Dexterity-based skill checks (1 hour); **Stage 2** [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) (1 hour); **Stage 3** [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and fatigued (1 hour)
